feed.title: Chris Gardner | Web Developer
feed.subtitle: I'm Chris Gardner, a former biomedical engineer, then photographer, now web developer. My interests are in backend, devops, and analytics, building things, and someday building in VR. My current skillset is Ruby+Rails, and upcoming skills are AWS, Docker, K8s, and Linux sysadmin.

entry.title: First Post
entry.content: First post! So excited!! It’s beyond time I got a proper personal site, so, here it is.
entry.summary: First post! So excited!! It’s beyond time I got a proper personal site, so, here it is.
